revised_title: Advancements in Bismuth Metallurgy: Separation and Refining Techniques
tldr: The authors present advancements in bismuth metallurgy, focusing on the separation and refining of bismuth from gold and other impurities. They describe a new method using zinc and bismuth litharge to effectively separate gold from bismuth, as well as a dry process for refining bismuth from lead and other impurities.
